mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tbl_animal_api(an_no, an_thumbnail, an_happen_date, an_happen_place, an_k_kind, an_color, an_age, an_weight, an_n_notice_no, an_n_start, an_n_end, an_image, an_p_s_state, an_g_gender, an_ne_neuter, an_special_mark, s_name, s_phone, s_address, an_o_organization, an_o_charge, an_o_charge_tel)
VALUES (#{an_no}, #{an_thumbnail}, #{an_happen_date}, #{an_happen_place}, #{an_k_kind}, #{an_color}, #{an_age}, #{an_weight}, #{an_n_notice_no}, #{an_n_start}, #{an_n_end}, #{an_image}, #{an_p_s_state}, #{an_g_gender}, #{an_ne_neuter}, #{an_special_mark}, #{s_name}, #{s_phone}, #{s_address}, #{an_o_organization}, #{an_o_charge}, #{an_o_charge_tel} )
